modName: RS Children--Forgotten City--Maliq--Face Mesh and Texture
summary: Adds a face-fix for RS Children and the child Maliq in The Forgotten City.
descriptionHtml:
[u][i][size=3][b]What It Does--[/b][/size][/i][/u]

After being shocked by the hideously ugly child RS Children transforms The Forgotten City's Maliq into, and searching the Nexus for a compatibility patch, I tried to make my own, only to fail miserably--but I was able to make him look somewhat human by adding a new mesh and face tint, without a esp.

It gets rid of the ugly neck seem/grey face and lumpy head, [size=3][u]but I have no idea if this will work for anyone else[/u][/size], and apologize in advance, but I figured I'd at least try and help others who were distraught to see such a awesome mods--Forgotten City and RS Children--in conflict.

Please leave comments and let me know if it works for you!

Thanks to the creators of both mods, they are truly must have mods.
[size=3][b][i]
[u]To Install--[/u][/i][/b][/size]

Drop these files in your Skyrim Data folder, both meshes and textures for the Forgotten City.
[b][i]
[/i][i][u][size=4]Links--[/size][/u][/i][i][u]
[/u][/i][/b]

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70219/?]The Forgotten City
[/url]


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/images/491997/?http://]Overlooked Armor Mods

[/url]Numerous armor/replacer mods that can help 'historify' your game!
author: Mayponce
